none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 30, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
If you look at the personnel involved, then the power contained in these tracks shouldn't really be a surprise. Sewn together with ominous soundscapes, Oakland's EXHAAUST drop four absolute bulldozers - low end crust/pv with terrifying slows (check the filthy start to "The Same Last Straw") and an arsenal of whirlwind riffing. A relatively new band, they are a few shows into their run and keep getting better live, I fear for Oakland when these kids really hit their stride. EXHAAUST
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-3bt1SRNNAxM/VgvmpI86urI/AAAAAAAANO4/mMIhUcOBvao/s1600/exhaaust%2Bcover.jpg http://exhaaust.bandcamp.com/releases

seo.title: Exhaaust - Exhaaust demo 2015 - Terminal Escape
